summary: Four slackers decide to avenge their humiliation at the hands of a con-man.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Riteish Deshmukh|Arshad Warsi|Javed Jaffrey|Aashish Chaudhary|Mallika Sherawat|Kangana Ranaut|Satish Kaushik|Zakir Hussain|Prem Chopra|Steven Dasz|Shahid Hasan|J. Brandon Hill|Harry Josh|Pradeep Kabra|Wasim Khan|Khurshed Lawyer|Michael Magnus|Latesh Sharma
title: Double Dhamaal
